column1: His lordship Justice Thambiah at page 262-263 stated as follows:
â€œThe object of the State Lands (Recovery of Possession) Act, No. 7 of 1979 is the speedy
recovery  of  possession  of  State  lands  from  persons  in  unauthorised  possession  or
occupation. The object of giving notice is to tell the occupier that he must vacate the
land and hand over possession; otherwise, the Competent Authority will resort to, the
speedy remedy provided for in the Act. The giving of notice under s. 3(1) to vacate
